_____1_____: How many story points it costs to raise a ship's maximum number of built-in hull mods the first time.
_____2_____: How much XP (in addition to the SP) it costs to raise a ship's maximum number of built-in hull mods the first time. This is modified by the ship's DP cost.
_____3_____: Determines how the story point cost grows as a ship's build-in limit grows. 0 for linear, 1 for exponential
_____4_____: story point cost is base * fac^n OR base + n*fac
_____5_____: XP cost is base * fac^n OR base + base*n*fac
_____6_____: Whether or not to allow increasing max S-Mods with story points
_____7_____: Coefficients for a polynomial that maps hull mods' OP cost to their base build-in XP cost, listed in ascending order (constant term first)
_____8_____: The above functions assume that the ship in question has the base DP cost for its ship class. Otherwise an additional multiplicative factor is assessed.
_____9_____: XP cost for a hull mod that costs x OP on a ship that takes y DP to deploy is (y / baseDP) * p(x) where p is the polynomial defined by the coefficients in xpCostCoeff
_____10_____: Fraction of spent XP that will be refunded when a built-in hull mod is removed If less than 0, removing built-in hull mods is disabled
_____11_____: When the player loses a ship with XP, this fraction of XP lost is added to a reserve pool that can be used by any ship with the same hull type.
_____12_____: Ignore the 'no_buil_in', allowing building in normally prohibited hull mods (specifically Safety Overrides)

combat._____13_____: Whether player ships that are disabled in battle should still receive XP
combat._____14_____: Whether enemy ships that get away shouldn't give XP
combat._____15_____: All XP gained by ships in combat is multiplied by this amount
combat._____16_____: Enemy ships with d-mods give less XP than pristine ships; however, regardless of the number of D-mods, they will always give at least this fraction of a pristine ship's XP.
combat._____17_____: All ships gain this fraction of the total XP gain as additional XP per combat
combat._____18_____: Civilian ships gain increased post-battle XP, by this much.
combat._____19_____: Combat ships gain increased post-battle XP for auto-resolve pursuits, by this much.
combat._____20_____: After each combat interval (in seconds), the contribution for each player ship is tallied and added to that ship's total contribution.
combat._____21_____: Fraction of enemy ships' total XP worth that goes toward each of the three roles. Does not have to add up to 1.

_____22_____: Set this to true in order to disable this mod's features and go back to building in S-Mods with story points. S-mods that have been built in with XP are not removed.
